label: A5B2_oP14_49_cehq_ab-001
title: $\beta$-Ta$_{2}$O$_{5}$ Structure
comments:
(Aleshina, 2002) place this structure in space group $Pccm$ \#49, while AFLOW's (and VASP's) default tolerance halves the size of the $c$-axis and places the system in space group $Pmmm$ \#47. The reported structure can be recovered using 
 aflow -{-}proto=A5B2\_oP14\_49\_cehq\_ab:O:Ta -{-}params=a,b/a,c/a,x$_{6}$,y$_{6}$ -{-}tolerance=0.001 . 
 It is likely that first-principles calculations starting from this point will relax to produce a structure equivalent to the smaller $Pmmm$ unit cell.
